statements: UPDATE player_distances SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE player_distances SET player_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-122.335167 47.608013)', 4326) WHERE player_name = 'Alice Smith';
UPDATE player_distances SET player_name = 'Alice', player_location = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-77.0369 38.9072)') WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_distances SET player_location = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-73.935242 40.73061)'), player_name = 'Bob' WHERE player_id = '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Players SET player_location = ST_Point(1.23, 4.56) WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Distances SET distance = 10.5 WHERE player1_id = 1 AND player2_id = 2;
UPDATE Players SET player_name = 'Alice', player_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)') WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Distances SET distance = 10 WHERE player1_id = 1 AND player2_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET item_name = 'Potion' WHERE inventory_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'Alice', player_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)') WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET item_category = 'Weapons' WHERE player_id = 2 AND item_name = 'Sword';
UPDATE Players SET player_location = 'POINT(10 20)' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerFriends SET player1_id = 3, player2_id = 4 WHERE friendship_id = 2;
UPDATE Players SET player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerDistances SET distance = 10.5 WHERE player1_id = 1 AND player2_id = 2;
UPDATE Player SET player_location = 'New York' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Item SET item_type = 'Armor' WHERE item_id = 3;
UPDATE Player SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE Item SET item_description = 'Rare item with special abilities' WHERE item_id = 5
